statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 0 \\ 12 \\ 0 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 0 \\ 17 \\ 2 \\ -15 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
